```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

Row {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r message=FALSE}
ggplotly(
  read_csv("./data/overall_df_2020.11.27.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  ggplot(aes(month, monthly_infection_rate, color = county)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(5, 9)) + 
  geom_line()
)
```

### Chart B

```{r message=FALSE}
ggplotly(
  read_csv("./data/overall_df_2020.11.27.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  ggplot(aes(month, monthly_fatality_rate, color = county)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(5, 9)) + 
  geom_line()
)
```
